Description: The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission announced that the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Illinois granted final approval to a $47,000,000 landmark agreement reached by attorneys for a class of over 5,000 women, the EEOC, and Rent-A-Center to settle two major lawsuits alleging class-wide sex discrimination. Under the terms of the settlement, RAC was to offer an estimated 1,100 jobs to women who had claimed sex discrimination under Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.
